title: Portfolio Website with Admin Dashboard
summary: Responsive portfolio with interactive dashboard (add/edit/delete projects & skills), auth (login/register), messaging system with activity logs. Data persisted via Local Storage.

title: Advanced To-Do List
summary: Tasks with categories and priorities, responsive UI, and persistence with Local Storage.

title: E-commerce Website
summary: Responsive app with authentication, product listings, favorites, shopping cart, dynamic navigation, and toast notifications. Data persisted in Local Storage.

title: Calculator (Scientific + Graphing)
summary: Scientific calculator with built-in graphing: DEG/RAD modes, math.js (no eval), Chart.js plotting, keyboard support, history (localStorage), and dark/light theme.

summary: Full social app with posts (create/edit/delete/save/share), stories with replies & reactions, nested comments with reaction counters, messenger with media, profile & settings, notifications, Dark/Light, EN/AR i18n. Persisted via IndexedDB & Local Storage.
